name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Golang Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring strong expertise in **Go**, alongside proficiency in **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Vue**, and **React**. I have a proven track record in developing scalable applications leveraging cloud technologies, particularly using **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and deployment. My experience spans architecting microservices and implementing **REST**ful APIs, enabling CI/CD pipelines to enhance development workflows and deployment efficiency.

In addition to my technical prowess, I have successfully led teams, providing mentorship and fostering collaboration, and I excel in communication across cross-functional teams. My background includes utilizing advanced technologies such as generative AI for innovative solutions, as well as developing robust applications in compliance with industry standards. With experience in database management using **Postgres**, I ensure data-driven decision-making and application performance. I am committed to delivering high-performance solutions that drive results.
